name: dfs.encrypt.data.transfer.cipher.key.bitlength
description:
The key bitlength negotiated by dfsclient and datanode for encryption.
    This value may be set to either 128, 192 or 256.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.token.max-lifetime
description:
The maximum lifetime in milliseconds for which a delegation 
      token is valid.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.containerlauncher.threadpool-initial-size
description:
The initial size of thread pool to launch containers in the
    app master.

name: dfs.datanode.handler.count
description: The number of server threads for the datanode.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.initial.delay.ms
description:
The initial delay (unit is ms) for locateFollowingBlock,
    the delay time will increase exponentially(double) for each retry
    until dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms is reached,
    after that the delay for each retry will be
    dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms.

name: hadoop.zk.retry-interval-ms
description: Retry interval in milliseconds when connecting to ZooKeeper.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.cleaner.interval-ms
description:
How often the job history cleaner checks for files to delete,
  in milliseconds. Defaults to 86400000 (one day). Files are only deleted if
  they are older than mapreduce.jobhistory.max-age-ms.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) a map reduce job is allowed to submit
    for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command line
    arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.
